name: sneaky
content:

doing things in a secret and unfair way: a sneaky plan
UK used to describe something you do, eat, or drink especially when you do it without telling anyone or when you should not really do it: She snuck out for a sneaky cigarette. There's always the temptation to take a sneaky peek at the presents under the Christmas tree.
